notes: Calvin Klein's sizing may differ from other brands. Always take fresh measurements before purchasing.
fit_notes: Calvin Klein underwear is known for a comfortable, supportive fit. If you are between sizes, consider your comfort preference - some prefer a snugger fit for support, while others opt for more breathability.

measurement_guide.how_to_measure:
Waist: Measure around your natural waistline where your pants typically sit.
Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your hips.
Chest: Measure around the fullest part of your chest.
tips: Compare your measurements to Calvin Klein's specific charts as their sizes can differ from other brands
For underwear bottoms, waist and hip measurements are most important
